verses.verse: ה֥וֹי <WH1945> Woe מֹרְאָ֖ה <WH4754> to her that is filthy וְנִגְאָלָ֑ה <WH1351> and polluted הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> city הַיּוֹנָֽה׃ <WH3238> to the oppressing

לֹ֤א <WH3808> no שָֽׁמְעָה֙ <WH8085> She obeyed בְּק֔וֹל <WH6963> not the voice לֹ֥א <WH3808> no לָקְחָ֖ה <WH3947> she received מוּסָ֑ר <WH4148> not correction בַּֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> not in the LORD לֹ֣א <WH3808> no בָטָ֔חָה <WH982> she trusted אֶל־ <WH413> to her אֱלֹהֶ֖יהָ <WH430> to her God לֹ֥א <WH3808> no קָרֵֽבָה׃ <WH7126> she drew not near

שָׂרֶ֣יהָ <WH8269> Her princes בְקִרְבָּ֔הּ <WH7130> within אֲרָי֖וֹת <WH738> lions שֹֽׁאֲגִ֑ים <WH7580> her [are] roaring שֹׁפְטֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH8199> her judges זְאֵ֣בֵי <WH2061> wolves עֶ֔רֶב <WH6153> [are] evening לֹ֥א <WH3808> nothing גָרְמ֖וּ <WH1633> they gnaw not the bones לַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> till the morrow

נְבִיאֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5030> Her prophets פֹּֽחֲזִ֔ים <WH6348> [are] light אַנְשֵׁ֖י <WH582> persons בֹּֽגְד֑וֹת <WH900> [and] treacherous כֹּהֲנֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH3548> her priests חִלְּלוּ־ <WH2490> have polluted קֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> the sanctuary חָמְס֖וּ <WH2554> they have done violence תּוֹרָֽה׃ <WH8451> to the law

יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> LORD צַדִּיק֙ <WH6662> The just בְּקִרְבָּ֔הּ <WH7130> [is] in the midst לֹ֥א <WH3808> no יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> thereof he will not do עַוְלָ֑ה <WH5766> iniquity בַּבֹּ֨קֶר <WH1242> every בַּבֹּ֜קֶר <WH1242> morning מִשְׁפָּט֨וֹ <WH4941> his judgment יִתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> doth he bring לָאוֹר֙ <WH216> to light לֹ֣א <WH3808> no נֶעְדָּ֔ר <WH5737> he faileth וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יוֹדֵ֥עַ <WH3045> knoweth עַוָּ֖ל <WH5767> not but the unjust בֹּֽשֶׁת׃ <WH1322> no shame

הִכְרַ֣תִּי <WH3772> I have cut off גוֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> the nations נָשַׁ֙מּוּ֙ <WH8074> are desolate פִּנּוֹתָ֔ם <WH6438> their towers הֶחֱרַ֥בְתִּי <WH2717> waste חֽוּצוֹתָ֖ם <WH2351> I made their streets מִבְּלִ֣י <WH1097> no עוֹבֵ֑ר <WH5674> that none passeth by נִצְדּ֧וּ <WH6658> are destroyed עָרֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5892> their cities מִבְּלִי־ <WH1097> one אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> so that there is no man מֵאֵ֥ין <WH369> else יוֹשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> that there is none inhabitant

אָמַ֜רְתִּי <WH559> I said אַךְ־ <WH389> Surely תִּירְאִ֤י <WH3372> Surely thou wilt fear אוֹתִי֙ <WH853> תִּקְחִ֣י <WH3947> me thou wilt receive מוּסָ֔ר <WH4148> instruction וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִכָּרֵ֣ת <WH3772> should not be cut off מְעוֹנָ֔הּ <WH4585> den כֹּ֥ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> i פָּקַ֖דְתִּי <WH6485> I punished עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> concerning אָכֵן֙ <WH403> them but הִשְׁכִּ֣ימוּ <WH7925> they rose early הִשְׁחִ֔יתוּ <WH7843> [and] corrupted כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all עֲלִילוֹתָֽם׃ <WH5949> all their doings

לָכֵ֤ן <WH3651> Therefore חַכּוּ־ <WH2442> Therefore wait לִי֙ נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ye upon me saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD לְי֖וֹם <WH3117> until the day קוּמִ֣י <WH6965> that I rise up לְעַ֑ד <WH5706> to the prey כִּ֣י <WH3588> Indeed מִשְׁפָּטִי֩ <WH4941> for my determination לֶאֱסֹ֨ף <WH622> [is] to gather גּוֹיִ֜ם <WH1471> the nations לְקָבְצִ֣י <WH6908> that I may assemble מַמְלָכ֗וֹת <WH4467> the kingdoms לִשְׁפֹּ֨ךְ <WH8210> to pour עֲלֵיהֶ֤ם <WH5921> on זַעְמִי֙ <WH2195> upon them mine indignation כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> All חֲר֣וֹן <WH2740> [even] all my fierce אַפִּ֔י <WH639> anger כִּ֚י <WH3588> Indeed בְּאֵ֣שׁ <WH784> with the fire קִנְאָתִ֔י <WH7068> of my jealousy תֵּאָכֵ֖ל <WH398> shall be devoured כָּל־ <WH3605> for all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> for all the earth

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For אָ֛ז <WH227> then אֶהְפֹּ֥ךְ <WH2015> For then will I turn אֶל־ <WH413> to עַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> to the people שָׂפָ֣ה <WH8193> language בְרוּרָ֑ה <WH1305> a pure לִקְרֹ֤א <WH7121> that they may all call כֻלָּם֙ <WH3605> all בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> upon the name יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְעָבְד֖וֹ <WH5647> to serve שְׁכֶ֥ם <WH7926> consent אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> him with one

מֵעֵ֖בֶר <WH5676> From beyond לְנַֽהֲרֵי־ <WH5104> the rivers כ֑וּשׁ <WH3568> of Ethiopia עֲתָרַי֙ <WH6282> my suppliants בַּת־ <WH1323> [even] the daughter פּוּצַ֔י <WH6327> of my dispersed יוֹבִל֖וּן <WH2986> shall bring מִנְחָתִֽי׃ <WH4503> mine offering

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he לֹ֤א <WH3808> no תֵב֙וֹשִׁי֙ <WH954> shalt thou not be ashamed מִכֹּ֣ל <WH3605> of all עֲלִילֹתַ֔יִךְ <WH5949> for all thy doings אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which פָּשַׁ֖עַתְּ <WH6586> wherein thou hast transgressed בִּ֑י כִּי־ <WH3588> For אָ֣ז ׀ <WH227> then אָסִ֣יר <WH5493> against me for then I will take away מִקִּרְבֵּ֗ךְ <WH7130> out of the midst עַלִּיזֵי֙ <WH5947> of thee them that rejoice גַּאֲוָתֵ֔ךְ <WH1346> in thy pride וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no תוֹסִ֧פִי <WH3254> and thou shalt no more לְגָבְהָ֛ה <WH1361> be haughty ע֖וֹד <WH5750> again בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> mountain קָדְשִֽׁי׃ <WH6944> because of my holy

וְהִשְׁאַרְתִּ֣י <WH7604> I will also leave בְקִרְבֵּ֔ךְ <WH7130> in the midst עַ֥ם <WH5971> people עָנִ֖י <WH6041> of thee an afflicted וָדָ֑ל <WH1800> and poor וְחָס֖וּ <WH2620> and they shall trust בְּשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> in the name יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

שְׁאֵרִ֨ית <WH7611> The remnant יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יַעֲשׂ֤וּ <WH6213> shall not do עַוְלָה֙ <WH5766> iniquity וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no יְדַבְּר֣וּ <WH1696> nor speak כָזָ֔ב <WH3577> lies וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor יִמָּצֵ֥א <WH4672> be found בְּפִיהֶ֖ם <WH6310> in their mouth לְשׁ֣וֹן <WH3956> tongue תַּרְמִ֑ית <WH8649> neither shall a deceitful כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הֵ֛מָּה <WH1992> they יִרְע֥וּ <WH7462> for they shall feed וְרָבְצ֖וּ <WH7257> and lie down וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> no מַחֲרִֽיד׃ <WH2729> and none shall make [them] afraid ס

רָנִּי֙ <WH7442> Sing בַּת־ <WH1323> O daughter צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> of Zion הָרִ֖יעוּ <WH7321> shout יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> O Israel שִׂמְחִ֤י <WH8055> be glad וְעָלְזִי֙ <WH5937> and rejoice בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לֵ֔ב <WH3820> with all the heart בַּ֖ת <WH1323> O daughter יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem

הֵסִ֤יר <WH5493> hath taken away יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> The LORD מִשְׁפָּטַ֔יִךְ <WH4941> thy judgments פִּנָּ֖ה <WH6437> he hath cast out אֹֽיְבֵ֑ךְ <WH341> thine enemy מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל ׀ <WH3478> of Israel יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> [even] the LORD בְּקִרְבֵּ֔ךְ <WH7130> [is] in the midst לֹא־ <WH3808> no תִֽירְאִ֥י <WH3372> will fear רָ֖ע <WH7451> evil עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> more

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> it יֵאָמֵ֥ר <WH559> it shall be said לִירֽוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> to Jerusalem אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֑אִי <WH3372> Fear צִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> thou not [and to] Zion אַל־ <WH408> nay יִרְפּ֥וּ <WH7503> be slack יָדָֽיִךְ׃ <WH3027> Let not thine hands

יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> The LORD אֱלֹהַ֛יִךְ <WH430> thy God בְּקִרְבֵּ֖ך <WH7130> in the midst גִּבּ֣וֹר <WH1368> of thee [is] mighty יוֹשִׁ֑יעַ <WH3467> he will save יָשִׂ֨ישׂ <WH7797> he will rejoice עָלַ֜יִךְ <WH5921> over בְּשִׂמְחָ֗ה <WH8057> over thee with joy יַחֲרִישׁ֙ <WH2790> he will rest בְּאַ֣הֲבָת֔וֹ <WH160> in his love יָגִ֥יל <WH1523> he will joy עָלַ֖יִךְ <WH5921> over בְּרִנָּֽה׃ <WH7440> over thee with singing

נוּגֵ֧י <WH3013> [them that are] sorrowful מִמּוֹעֵ֛ד <WH4150> for the solemn assembly אָסַ֖פְתִּי <WH622> I will gather מִמֵּ֣ךְ <WH4480> about הָי֑וּ <WH1961> become מַשְׂאֵ֥ת <WH4864> of it [was] a burden עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> and חֶרְפָּֽה׃ <WH2781> [who] are of thee [to whom] the reproach

הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> I am going עֹשֶׂ֛ה <WH6213> I will undo אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מְעַנַּ֖יִךְ <WH6031> all that afflict בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> Behold at that time הַהִ֑יא <WH1931> I וְהוֹשַׁעְתִּ֣י <WH3467> thee and I will save אֶת־ <WH853> הַצֹּלֵעָ֗ה <WH6760> her that halteth וְהַנִּדָּחָה֙ <WH5080> her that was driven out אֲקַבֵּ֔ץ <WH6908> and gather וְשַׂמְתִּים֙ <WH7760> and I will get לִתְהִלָּ֣ה <WH8416> them praise וּלְשֵׁ֔ם <WH8034> and fame בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> in every land בָּשְׁתָּֽם׃ <WH1322> where they have been put to shame

בָּעֵ֤ת <WH6256> At that time הַהִיא֙ <WH1931> I אָבִ֣יא <WH935> will I bring אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> וּבָעֵ֖ת <WH6256> you [again] even in the time קַבְּצִ֣י <WH6908> that I gather אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Indeed אֶתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> you for I will make אֶתְכֶ֜ם <WH853> לְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> you a name וְלִתְהִלָּ֗ה <WH8416> and a praise בְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> all עַמֵּ֣י <WH5971> among all people הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth בְּשׁוּבִ֧י <WH7725> when I turn back אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁבוּתֵיכֶ֛ם <WH7622> your captivity לְעֵינֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5869> before your eyes אָמַ֥ר <WH559> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD
